short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show your support for social distancing while staying social. Six spaces say it all. Powered by: Mering. We move people.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically turn your social post into a public support for social
distancing while tweeting or posting things like “Condensing my life to
everything within reach of my couch.” Or “Remember wearing pants?”
Or even “what day is it?”

Adds 6 characters of separation and the #SocialSocialDistancing to
whatever you type.

Applicable everywhere that doesn’t auto-correct spacing (sorry Facebook
users.)

Ideal for Tweeting from your desktop.

Social Social Distancing provides that extra oomph to your social distancing posts.

Steps to Install:
Click Add to Chrome


Partnered with Andrew Rhyand to develop.
